title: Embedded UART Communication
description: Company project carried out at Cristec consisting of developing and implementing a reliable UART communication protocol between an ESP32-C3 microcontroller and an STM32F0. The specifications required a 100 ms exchange period, but optimization of the code, interrupt handling, and use of DMA (Direct Memory Access) on both microcontrollers made it possible to achieve an effective speed of 6 ms, while ensuring data integrity verification via CRC control.

title: Production Software DSN Extension
description: Modernization project for an industrial labeling production software. The goal was to adapt the program to retrieve production data not only from the existing database but also from a new one introduced by the company. The work involved updating DSN (Data Source Name) connection strings, handling compatibility between data schemas, and performing consistency tests to ensure the reliability of generated labels.
software: C#, ODBC, SQL Server, Visual Studio

title: Test Bench Upgrade
description: Company project aimed at modernizing a test bench to validate new products developed by the company. The work involved adapting test logic and communication interfaces to integrate these new models, while updating the serial number management system to accommodate a new format imposed by the production department. The project also included validation and functional testing phases to ensure the reliability and compliance of the updated test bench.

title: Platformer Game
description: Project developed during the second year of the CIR cycle at ISEN Rennes. The game is inspired by the mobile game 'Doodle Jump', developed in C++ using the Qt graphics library.

title: Game of Life
description: Project completed during the first year of the CIR cycle at ISEN Rennes. The program reproduces and simulates John Horton Conway's Game of Life.

title: Photo Gallery
description: Project developed during the second year of the CIR cycle at ISEN Rennes. The goal of this project was to create a web photo gallery application.

title: Frequency Generator
description: Frequency generator built on PCB capable of generating a triangular or sinusoidal signal. Powered by 12 V, it can produce frequencies between 1 Hz and 1 MHz.

title: Mini FM Radio
description: Mini FM radio built on a 5.5 × 2.7 cm PCB, powered by two 1.5 V batteries. Output via jack port.

title: LED Cube
description: 8×8×8 LED cube fully hand-soldered, featuring various animations. Custom animations can also be programmed.

title: Short Film – Adventure Theme
description: Short film produced during the first year of studies on the theme of adventure.

title: Controversy Mapping
description: Mapping project about video games, presented as a website to highlight the various applications of video games in today's world.
